data.name: poet
data.sentence: There was a poet and statesman named Qu Yuan who served the Kingdom of Chu.
data.definition: There was a _____ and statesman named Qu Yuan who served the Kingdom of Chu.

languages.tr_sentence: 有一位為楚國效力的「詩人」和政治家，名叫屈原。

data.name: boats
data.sentence: Upon hearing the news, the local people paddled their boats out to search for him but could not find Qu Yuan.
data.definition: Upon hearing the news, the local people paddled their _____ out to search for him but could not find Qu Yuan.

languages.tr_sentence: 當地百姓聞訊，紛紛劃「船」出海尋找屈原，但始終沒有找到屈原。

data.name: artemisia leaves
data.sentence: To prevent fish and shrimp from harming his body, they threw glutinous rice and artemisia leaves into the water.
data.definition: To prevent fish and shrimp from harming his body, they threw glutinous rice and _____ into the water.

languages.tr_sentence: 為了防止魚蝦傷害他的身體，他們把糯米和「艾葉」丟進水裡。

data.name: zongzi
data.sentence: People race dragon boats and eat zongzi to commemorate Qu Yuan and express their love and loyalty to their country.
data.definition: People race dragon boats and eat _____ to commemorate Qu Yuan and express their love and loyalty to their country.

languages.tr_sentence: 人們賽龍舟、吃“粽子”，以紀念屈原，表達對祖國的熱愛和忠誠。
